conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: Hey Mood, I've been wondering, how did you get your name?

conversation.speaker: Mood
conversation.text: Well, it's kind of an interesting story. You see, I have these superpowers that I can only activate when I'm in a certain mood. When I'm happy, I can fly, when I'm sad I can become invisible, when I'm angry I can set things on fire, but when I'm in a dark mood I can manipulate shadows.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: Wow, that's amazing! So your name has something to do with your powers and your moods?

conversation.speaker: Mood
conversation.text: Exactly. My friends started calling me Mood because of my powers. They thought it was fitting, and it just stuck. And also because I am often in a dark mood, it became more fitting.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: I can see why they would call you that! So, does your name have any special meaning?

conversation.speaker: Mood
conversation.text: Not really, just a catchy name for a guy with mood-powered superpowers and often in a dark mood.
